TitleEnglish: A Beginner with the Mightiest Account
SummaryEnglish: Adapted from the Tencent Comics manga of the same name, in the year 2063, Earth enters the era of gaming. The young Ye Hao awakens with a king account. To protect his loved ones, he overcomes numerous challenges, defeats monsters from other worlds, conquers young girls, and gains their hearts. In the end, he successfully stops the conspiracy to destroy the world and protects his family.
Aliases: It Starts With a Kingpin Account
